座布団: (ざぶとん) - zabuton (flat floor cushion used when sitting or kneeling; usu. rectangular)
座布団を当てる: (ざぶとんをあてる) - to sit on a cushion
座席指定券: (ざせきしていけん) - reserved-seat ticket
座所: (ざしょ) - throne; (the place of) a nobleman's seat
座敷: (ざしき) - tatami room/tatami mat room/formal Japanese room; dinner party in a tatami room (esp. when a geisha or maiko attends)
座敷牢: (ざしきろう) - (Edo-period) room for confining criminals or lunatics
座敷犬: (ざしきけん) - dog that is raised indoors
座敷着: (ざしきぎ) - dress worn by a geisha to a zashiki party
座敷童: (ざしきわらし) - protective household deity in Tohoku, appearing as a red-faced child spirit with bobbed-hair
座敷童子: (ざしきわらし) - protective household deity in Tohoku, appearing as a red-faced child spirit with bobbed-hair
座椅子: (ざいす) - tatami chair; legless chair; small, legless chair used while sitting on tatami
座標図形処理: (ざひょうずけいしょり) - coordinate graphics; line graphics
座標変換: (ざひょうへんかん) - coordinate transformation
座標幾何学: (ざひょうきかがく) - coordinate geometry
座礁: (ざしょう) - running aground; being stranded
座禅: (zazen) - zazen (meditação Zen sentada, geralmente na posição de pernas cruzadas)
座禅草: (ザゼンソウ) - eastern skunk cabbage (Symplocarpus foetidus)
座繰り: (ざぐり) - (座繰り, 坐繰り only) reeling by hand (esp. silk)/hand filature; (esp. 座ぐり) counter sinking (making conical depression so screw-heads don't protrude above surface)/spot facing (machining a flat space for bolt head, etc.)/spotfacing; (esp. 座刳り) hollowing out (e.g. wooden chair seat, scallop pattern on roof, etc.)
座臥: (ざが) - daily life; sitting and lying down
座興: (ざきょう) - entertainment; fun; amusement of the company
座蒲: (ざふ) - round cushion used for Zen meditation (traditionally made of woven bulrush leaves)
座蒲団: (ざぶとん) - zabuton (flat floor cushion used when sitting or kneeling; usu. rectangular)
座視: (ざし) - remaining an idle spectator; looking on unconcernedly (doing nothing)
座観式庭園: (ざかんしきていえん) - small garden best enjoyed while sitting at a fixed viewing point
座部: (ざぶ) - seat (of chair, bench, etc.); seat base
座長: (ざちょう) - chairman; leader of a troupe/proprietor of a theatrical company
座頭虫: (ざとうむし) - harvestman; daddy longlegs (arachnid of order Opiliones)
座頭鯨: (ザトウクジラ) - humpback whale (Megaptera novaeangliae)
庫入れ: (くらいれ) - warehousing; storing in a warehouse
庫裏: (くり) - temple kitchen/monastery kitchen; quarters of a head priest (and his family)
庫裡: (くり) - temple kitchen/monastery kitchen; quarters of a head priest (and his family)
庫院: (くいん) - kitchen-cum-office of a Zen temple or monastery, where meals are prepared and senior priests have their offices
庭: (tei/niwa) - garden , garden, yard, courtyard; field (of action), area
庭いじり: (にわいじり) - gardening; puttering around in the garden
庭で作った野菜: (にわでつくったやさい) - vegetables grown in one's yard
庭園様式: (ていえんようしき) - garden style
庭土: (にわど) - garden soil; soil used in a garden
庭常: (ニワトコ) - red-berried elder (Sambucus racemosa subsp. sieboldiana); Japanese elderberry
庭弄り: (にわいじり) - gardening; puttering around in the garden
庭掃除: (にわそうじ) - tidying a garden; sweeping the yard; garden work
庭景: (ていけい) - (beautiful) scenery of a garden; gardenscape
庭梅: (ニワウメ) - Chinese bushberry (Prunus japonica); bush cherry
庭漆: (にわうるし) - tree of heaven (Ailanthus altissima)
庭火: (ていりょう) - garden bonfire (esp. one held on the imperial grounds)
庭燎: (ていりょう) - garden bonfire (esp. one held on the imperial grounds)
庭番: (にわばん) - guard of the inner garden
庭石菖: (ニワゼキショウ) - blue-eyed grass (Sisyrinchium rosulatum)
庭見草: (にわみぐさ) - bush clover/Japanese clover (any flowering plant of genus Lespedeza); Japanese fiber banana (Musa basjoo)
庭詰: (にわづめ) - waiting in front of a temple to be accepted for training (in Zen Buddhism)
